Function.Description: The month function returns the day of the month corresponding to a Date argument.

Brief.Overview: The month function returns the month portion of a date or time argument. The month value ranges from 0 through 12.
Brief.Usage: The month function is used to extract the month component from a Date object.

Argument.Name: dateStr
Argument.Note: A date represented as a String in the form mm/dd/yyyy where mm is the month number, dd is the day of the month and yyyy is the year.

Argument.Name: Julian-date
Argument.Note: The number of days elapsed since the birth of Christ.

Syntax.Return: An Integer that represents the month component of the argument
